question: Which of the following becomes the first Indian oil company to trade lubricants in Myanmar?
explanation: Hindustan Petroleum Corporation Ltd (HPCL), a public sector oil company has started selling lubricants in Myanmar. HPCL has started operations in Myanmar's commercial hubs of Yangon and Mandalay. Other public sector oil companies of India such as Bharat Petroleum Corporation Ltd. (BPCL) and Indian Oil Corporation (IOC) are evaluating opportunities of fuel retailing in Myanmar.
